definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Please put the thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 请把体温表夹在你的腋下。

sentences.english: The student came along with an English dictionary under his arm.
sentences.chinese: 这名学生腋下夹着一本英语词典走来。

sentences.english: Use underarm deodorant, and go easy with cologne.
sentences.chinese: 使用腋下除臭剂，少用些古龙香水。

sentences.english: The master instructs in jabbing the palms under an opponent's armpits.
sentences.chinese: 师傅教导用手掌撞推对手的腋下。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm. Please?
sentences.chinese: 我来给你量量体温，请把体温表放在腋下。

sentences.english: He tucked the bassoon under an arm and stamped out.
sentences.chinese: 他把巴松管夹在腋下，跺着脚走了出去。

sentences.english: He rubbed some deodorant under his armpits before dressing.
sentences.chinese: 穿衣时，他往腋下擦了些防臭剂。

sentences.english: Would you put the thermometer under your arm, please?
sentences.chinese: 你把体温表放在腋下好吗？

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你量量体温，请把体温表放在腋下。

sentences.english: The dark crescent-shaped patterns under your arms conceal it nicely.
sentences.chinese: 你腋下深色的新月状图案将其隐藏得很好。

sentences.english: It is only suitable for Hyperhidrosis of the axillae .
sentences.chinese: 只有适合的腋下多汗症。

sentences.english: The gimp came again with a roll of old newspapers under his oxter.
sentences.chinese: 那个瘸子腋下夹着一卷旧报纸又来了。

sentences.english: There are some swellings in my armpit.
With your hands and arms at your side and the ball firmly under the attacking arms armpit.
sentences.chinese: 手和手臂垂于体侧，球牢靠地置于攻击手腋下。

sentences.english: Jacqui even has a tattoo of an open eye inside her right armpit.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔甚至还在其右臂腋下纹上了一只睁开的眼睛。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
